author: Hannah Fry
description:
Bluff bodies are also often called blunt bodies - but bluff is a much funnier word so I'm sticking with it

If you want to go deeper down this rabbit hole (and who wouldn't!?), a great start is Facing the Heat Barrier: A History of Hypersonics by T.A. Heppenheimer (2006)
title: The beauty of a bluff body: why the reentry capsule is so iconically conic
